duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and service CLIENT equipment at Retailer locations.
Transport, install, and maintain CLIENT equipment, replacement parts, tools, and other equipment in an organized manner.
Troubleshoot and restore malfunctioning equipment to working order.
Effectively communicate with Dispatchers and accurately report activity, arrival and departure times, and equipment problems.
Deliver marketing supplies and consumable parts, as well as provide basic training to new Retailers or refresher training to correct procedural errors.
Complete basic forms for reporting activities, equipment problems, and recommendations for improvements to procedures.
